property.name: Tor Park Hotel
property.description:
Tor Park Hotel is an inviting hotel located in a 
tranquil suburban area of picturesque Torquay on the English Riviera. 
Our hotel offers a peaceful retreat for guests looking for a relaxing getaway, 
while also being within easy reach of local attractions and activities. 
At the Tor Park Hotel, we pride ourselves on providing our guests with a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere. 
Although we do not have a bar, 
guests are welcome to bring their own alcohol
property.location:
24 Vansittart Road,
Torquay, TQ2 5BW, United Kingdom

property.name: The Richmond Hotel
property.description:
Located in Torquay, The Richmond Hotel is near the beach. 
Torquay Golf Club and Dartmouth Steam Railway are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, 
while those looking for area attractions can visit Paignton Zoo and Babbacombe Model Village and Gardens. 
Greenway House and Garden and Golden Hind are also worth visiting.

property.name: St Elmo Hotel
property.description: Our friendly Blackpool Hotel is ideally situated just minutes from the promenade, opposite the South Pier and famous local attractions - Blackpool Pleasure Beach and Sandcastle are only a short walk away. All rooms en-suite, lift to all floors. The venue provides guestrooms appointed with multi-channel TV, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and smoke detectors for a pleasant stay in Blackpool.
property.location:
20 Station Road,
Blackpool, FY4 1BE, United Kingdom

property.name: Orlando hotel
property.description: Hotel Orlando is a small, friendly hotel, in Hammersmith, West London situated within walking distance to Hammersmith underground station, connected with 3 main underground lines, only 15 minutes away from Piccadilly and within easy reach to other tourist attraction and to Heathrow Airport.
property.location:
83 Shepherds Bush Road,
London, W6 7LR, United Kingdom

property.name: Holland Road Stays
property.description: The 120 Holland Road offers accommodation in London’s Kensington district, just a 5-minute walk from Barons Court and West Kensington Tube stations. This property consists of 15 Self contained studios and offers free WiFi throughout.
property.location:
120 Holland Road,
London, W14 8BD, United Kingdom

property.name: Green Gables Hotel
property.description: Accommodations range from simply decorated rooms to low-key apartments. All rooms have en-suite bathrooms, tea and coffeemaking facilities, and flat-screen TVs. Apartments have full kitchens, living rooms and separate bathrooms.

West Bank,

property.name: Crofton House Hotel
property.description: Stay in the heart of Torquay Crofton House Hotel is exclusively . Set in an 1850's villa offering guests a choice of 16 suites and rooms, all with flat-screen TV with multiple Free view channels, complimentary tea, coffee, eco-friendly toiletries and Wi-Fi. There is private and street parking. Guests have repeatedly highly rated Crofton House for value and quality of service.
property.location:
17 Croft Road,
Torquay, TQ2 5TZ, United Kingdom

property.name: Bonair Hotel
property.description: The Hotel Bonair is a friendly family hotel, With accommodation for approximately 70 people making it an ideal choice for families and individuals alike, to whom we offer an outstanding holiday. It is ideally situated on the level on Paignton Sea Front, and is within walking distance to all the local amenities.
property.location:
35 Esplanade Road,
Paignton, TQ4 6BL, United Kingdom

property.name: Alumhurst Hotel
property.description: Alumhurst Hotel is located just over 5 minutes’ walk from Blackpool’s seafront, the tower and Central Pier. It offers en suite rooms. Each room at Alumhurst Hotel has modern décor, a TV and tea and coffee-making facilities.
